```{r setup}
library(Canek)
library(CanekDebug)
```


```{r}
x <- RunCanek(SimBatches$batches, debug = TRUE)
```


```{r}
GetDebugInfo(x)
```

```{r}
plotRunningTime(x)
```


```{r}
plotTopGenes(x)
```

```{r}
CheckUncorrectedMemberships(x)
```

```{r}
plotCorrectionHeatmap(x)
```

```{r}
plotCorrectionHist(x)
```
